document.full_text: a north carolina man was sentenced to 60 months probation by a federal judge for scrawling his name on an arizona carving that is at least 1,000 years-old, u.s. authorities said on tuesday.
document.title: man sanctioned for defacing 1,000-year-old native carving
lines_and_colors: a north carolina man was sentenced to 60 months probation by a federal judge for scrawling his name on an arizona carving that is at least 1,000 years-old, u.s. authorities said on tuesday.
